metadata.dc:author: Gutiérrez del Pozo, R
Corominas Estrella, S
Alcover García, J
Pedemonte Vives, J
Romero Martín, J A
Calvo Quintero, J E
Carretero González, P
metadata.dc:description: Fistulization is an uncommon complication in Xanthogranulomatous Pyelonephritis, but harmful for the adjacent organs. Owing to their rare localization we present 6 cases with scrotal skin, bronchi, colon and spleen fistulization.
metadata.dc:title: Fistulización en la pielonefritis xantogranulomatosa. Presentación de 6 casos clínicos y revisión de la literatura.
[Fistulization in xanthogranulomatous pyelonephritis. Presentation of 6 clinical cases and review of the literature].
